text: Jon Shepodd (December 19, 1924 - August 16, 2017) was an American actor. He was known for his role as Paul Martin in the television series Lassie. Jon Shepodd filmography, The New York Times. Shepodd died on August 16, 2017 at his London, England home at the age of 92.‘Lassie’ Star Jon Shepodd Dies at 92 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Birmingham, Alabama Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Jon Shepodd
